Description: The first anthology based on characters from the novella "The Traveling Players of Gilean" by Margaret Weis and Aron Eisenberg also contains novellas by popular Dragonlance authors Douglas Niles, Richard A. Knaak, Paul B. Thompson, and a new collaboration by Jean Rabe and Aron Eisenberg. Original..
